name: GWP-Captcha
author: Karl Kiesinger

sections.description: This is a simple captcha system. That you can setting how many letter you would like and pick on what form you would like it on. The captcha in a image with easy to read. It dose not using any cookie to storing data. It send the code in a encryption to the file that makes the image. If you would like more features with this. Please go to my web site
sections.installation:
1. Uncompressed the file and upload the folder GWP-Captcha to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: This will add letter captcha to your register form, login form, and lostpassword form. You can turn them on or off. If you only want it to be on for r …
